articles.description: Marvin Bagley III, who suffered a mild right knee sprain Thursday, will miss Duke's game against Georgia Tech on Sunday as a precaution.
articles.headline: Marvin Bagley III to miss Sunday's game with mild knee sprain

articles.description: Joe Lunardi weighs in on what the Wildcats' unprecedented three-game losing streak means for their standing in the SEC and the NCAA tournament.
articles.headline: Time for Kentucky to panic?

images.caption: Joe Lunardi weighs in on what the Wildcats' unprecedented three-game losing streak means for their standing in the SEC and the NCAA tournament.
images.name: Time for Kentucky to panic?

articles.description: Selection Sunday is exactly one month away. Here's what you'll see in four weeks: Michael Porter Jr. will be back and a nightmare for a No. 1 seed, Trae Young's Sooners will drop, and the ACC will dominate the field
articles.headline: Selection Sunday is a month away ... here's what will happen

images.caption: Michael Porter Jr.'s season was supposed to be over ... unless it isn't.
images.name: Michael Porter [608x342]

images.caption: Trae Young has carried Oklahoma, but the final stretch could be more than he can handle on his own.
images.name: Trae Young [608x342] - Copy (2)

images.caption: The crowd goes wild in Virginia as College GameDay explains what it means to be a "great team" in the chaos of college basketball this season.
images.name: Any great college hoops team right now?

articles.description: Tavrion Dawson and Micheal Warren tossed in 22 points apiece and Cal State-Northridge shot 65 percent from the floor in a 77-71 victory over Hawaii on Saturday night.
articles.headline: Dawson propels CSU Northridge to 77-71 win over Hawaii

articles.description: Gabe Levin and Temidayo Yussuf posted double-doubles and Long Beach State pulled away in the second half to defeat Cal Poly 73-54 on Saturday night.
articles.headline: Levin, Yussuf power Long Beach State past Cal Poly 73-54

articles.description: With less than seven seconds left and tied at 94-94, Stephen Thompson Jr. drains the game-winning 3-pointer to lead the Beavers to victory in double-overtime against the Huskies.
articles.headline: Oregon State's Thompson sinks dagger on Washington at buzzer

images.caption: With less than seven seconds left and tied at 94-94, Stephen Thompson Jr. drains the game-winning 3-pointer to lead the Beavers to victory in double-overtime against the Huskies.
images.name: Oregon State's Thompson sinks dagger on Washington at buzzer

videos.description: Donte DiVincenzo comes off the bench for Villanova and drains two nice 3-pointers in the first 10 minutes of the game against DePaul.
videos.headline: Villanova's DiVincenzo knocks in a couple of triples

tracking.trackingName: COM_NCB_One Play ( Villanova's DiVincenzo knocks in a couple of triples) 2017/12/27 ESHEET

videos.description: Phil Booth passes through two DePaul defenders and connects with Eric Paschall who takes it to the rim for one-handed slam in the first half.
videos.headline: Villanova's Booth finds Paschall in traffic for dunk

tracking.trackingName: COM_NCB_One Play (Villanova's Booth finds Paschall in traffic for dunk) 2017/12/27 ESHEET

videos.description: Jalen Brunson speeds down the court and finds Eric Paschall who rises up for the flush in the first half against DePaul.
videos.headline: Paschall throws down vicious alley-oop

tracking.trackingName: COM_NCB_One Play (Paschall throws down vicious alley-oop) 2017/12/27 ESHEET

videos.description: Omari Spellman intercepts the ball from DePaul and goes coast-to-coast for an easy one-handed dunk in the beginning of the second half.
videos.headline: Villanova's Spellman steals and slams

tracking.trackingName: COM_NCB_One Play (Villanova's Spellman steals and slams) 2017/12/27 ESHEET

videos.description: Mikal Bridge sends a smooth pass to Omari Spellman who jams it home.  Spellman has his fifth double-double of the season.
videos.headline: Spellman's dunk gets him another double-double

tracking.trackingName: COM_NCB_One Play (Spellman's dunk gets him another double-double) 2012/12/27 ESHEET
